Alpha ::

Alpha did the thing that Ice told. "Take this Over develop Garbage" 
shouted the femme while she shot against Sirugital 25 times.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Ice fealt for Alpha, she had lost many friends in this war. If the 
mutant had her way she'd be stranded on a deserted planetoid 
somewhere with Lunarpine. "I'm sorry about your friend." her spark 
reached out for the strength to control her emotions and her 
thoughts. "But for now we need to concentrate on the task before us." 
she quickly scanned the minds of the Maximals around to see if any 
were hurt, "Circle around and try to hit it from behind." she wanted 
to direct Surgital away from the city to do that they had to work 
together.
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Airshadow Nightlight 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Saturday, October 06, 2001 10:33 PM
>   Subject: Re: Mutant vs Decepticons.
> 
> 
>   Alphah:: 
> 
>   "Please let me help you!!!!"said the young femme"Those 
Decepticons captured my friend Condor and we never know about him a 
long time ago" 
> 
>   "I hope that he isn't dead"thought sadly the femme 
> 
>     CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote: 
> 
>     Ice looked down at the Maximal that had just come out of the 
city. "Please
>     don't be afraid I'm a friend come to help." Her tone was 
soothing, the last
>     thing she wanted was to startle Alpha Dolphy into attacking 
her. She
>     chuckled at the thought. "Damaged by friendly fire, what would 
Lunarpine
>     say?" she thought about the lecture she'd recieve but quickly 
dismissed it.
>     There were more important things to worry about. "Right now we 
have to take
>     care of that thing."  she said directing the attention towards 
Surgital.
>     Knowing that she'd need her strength she transformed into her 
mutant robot
>     form. A robots head now sat atop a polar bears body with owl 
wings keeping
>     her aloft. raising her paws she formed another ball of 
depleteing energy.
>     "I'll keep it busy, try to direct the others to hit it too." 
With a motion
>     similar to  a pitchers release the mu! tant let the ball of 
energy fly toward
>     Surgitals torso.

a

struck
>     > forceing

her

>     > > but to her misfortune she needed her flying abilities and 
the owls
>     > sight.
>     > > "If you really feel that way then I'll play a! long." her 
small
>     > curved beak
>     > > began to glow and two energy depleating bursts launched 
through the
>     > air
>     > > toward it's intended target Perceptor.

was

for a

>     > > force pushed her on. "We got one of thier jets on the 
ground behind
>     > that
>     > > rock." she directed pointing a wing toward where 
Triggerhappy and

>     > > were hid, "If we keep him there it'll weaken thier air 
support."

him

>     > that
